attributes.title: Way too much work
attributes.review: This app immediately asked me for my phone number! I just want to know when his next rallies are. It’s way too much work to put in my number so I deleted the app. Plus, I would never give my phone number to a pedophilic Cheeto puff.
attributes.userName: The VP of the United States

attributes.title: I was really rooting for you Trump
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as an American citizen, and once it asked for my ethnicity, which is Chinese. It started to send robots my way and gave my phone a virus. Second to that once i pulled up the app i saw a rapist on the screen. Come on america, we can do better.

attributes.title: gave my phone a virus and barely works
attributes.review: this app has many many glitches and made my phone go MUCH slower. i was very excited to download this app but it barely works well and made my phone much slower. i would not recommend.

attributes.title: promotes child neglect
attributes.review: so recently i got this app to see what my president was up to😁. while researching my president i've recently seen #savebarron so i had to look into this 👀 and then it hit me so i went to get a bag of cheetos to continue my thought i then started choking and spit out my cheeto and the wild thing is that it looked exactly like how trump is portrayed in this app which was kind of weird to me so i wanted to see what barron looked like so i can plot his kidnapping it's crazy he looks nothing like his father and i had a stroke

attributes.title: Terrible and traumatic
attributes.review: So I opened the app because of course I want to know what’s going on and the first thing I see is a pop up that called me ugly!! I was hurt. Then the app said I was stupid and fat and they’ll steal my family 😭 anyways it was a terrible experience and now I’m gonna go cry bye

attributes.title: Disgrace.
attributes.review: Jesus where do I begin 😔.. I installed the app so I can figure out when the next rally for our beloved president. I opened the app and the first thing I see is a horrific image. A orange clown 🤡. It scarred my eyes I almost forgot why I installed the app. Anyways the app is trash if I could give it zero stars I would ☺️.

attributes.title: Don’t even
attributes.review: I really would give this app zero stars it gave my phone the corona virus but phone version. It had to be on a charger ventilator to keep it alive after seeing a terrifying cheeto monster (that had the virus). Completely awful would not recommend

attributes.title: Made me projectile vomit
attributes.review:
I opened the app and what I saw was so disgusting that I projectile vomited and had to go to the E.R. They said that I now will have PTSD whenever I hear the word tru- tr- I can’t even type it without feeling disgusted. If I see his face either I get really sick. Terrible app ew seeing this app gives me ptsd
- berry bee benson

attributes.title: It killed my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the whole big ruckus was about. And to be honest was not impressed. This app kept on glitch and it DRAINED ALL MY BATTERY. It also made my phone restart and I lost all my contacts and pictures. I do not recommend.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: First of all when I got on the screen of the App Store it’s started glitching out. When the app finally finished downloading after five days which is a new record I might add. Once I opened the app it started showing this ugly orange that was horrid to look at
